title: Drawing, "Sea Cintaur Combats Sea Monster", ca. 1805
medium: Black chalk on off white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Two different compositions situated one on top of other. Above, sea monster clubbing forehead of centaur.  Woman, riding centaur, jumps into water.  Below, centaur with satyr woman riding on his back, holds club in lowered arm and stag head against mouth of monster.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sea Cintaur Combats Sea Monster", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Black chalk on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-498.
